about_the_game:
Are you a fan of the brain tingles from soft whispers and sounds? Does binaural audio get you off? Well, good news!



Welcome to ASM-VR a 360 audio-only, haptics charged, adult experience! This audio is omni directional which means you can rotate your head to follow the audio sources. Our special 8 mic array produces the sexiest ambisonics you've ever heard. This ain't your daddy's asmr, this is ASMVR baby!

Prepare to be treated to the soundtrack of Vex Ruby and Dev Gal, one of our lovely developers, getting down and dirty behind closed doors. It’s playful, raunchy, and incredibly romantic. They take turns playing with each other using their mouths, fingers, and any implement they have handy. Enjoy the kissing, slurping, moaning, squealing sounds of our two resident Lewdtubers having the best time ever with each other. (NB: not gonna lie, listening to this made me blush a little -Quinn)

Don't forget your adult toys because we captured that action too!

This is best done with VR and headphones since the audio is positional. You should be able to look around and hear the audio change shape to simulate the sensation of actually being there.

ASM-VR is a recording technique that involves capturing sound in every direction using a special 8 channel microphone shaped and configured like human ears. This means that you can use VR or your mouse to change the direction you're listening to like you're really there! It also has full adult toy synchronization so you can close your eyes and enjoy every sensation.

This dream is an audio experience with adult toy and head tracking support. There are no rendered visuals other than a dreamy mist. This is best experienced with a VR headset with decent headphones.

Runtime: 22m 50s
Featuring: Vex Ruby, Dev Gal, and a Lovense Nora as Blenderdick Cuminsnatch
